articles.title: Agricultural Workers' Art Performance Given
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers' Art Performance Given
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The art performance "Song of best wishes to the General" was given by agricultural workers at the Mangyongdae Farm on Tuesday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					The performance started with the ode and chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Il."
					
					Put on the stage were numbers representing the immense joy and best wishes of the agricultural workers and other people of the DPRK greeting the greatest national auspicious holiday in February.
					
					The performers in such numbers as the female solo "Frost Flowers" and the Kayagum ensemble "Whenever We Think of the Road of Songun" sang high praises of the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and achieving the national prosperity for all the generations to come, holding aloft the red flag of the revolution associated with the whole life of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Jangsaenap and song "Arirang of Army-People Unity," the solo play "Legend about Taehongdan," the mixed chorus "We Have Planted Apple Trees on Mountains," the drum-beating and song "Let's Dash Forward to Build a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation" and other numbers fully reflected the changes brought about by servicepersons and people in the socialist rural areas through their concerted efforts under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and the patriotic devotion of the agricultural workers.
					
					The performance was appreciated by Chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Kang Chang Uk, officials concerned and agricultural workers.

articles.title: 14th Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Closes
articles.content:
14th Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Closes
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The 14th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions, which opened on January 21 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Tuesday.
					The State Planning Commission, the Mansudae Art Studio and the External Service Bureau respectively placed first in total team standings in the contest divided into three groups.
					
					Present at the closing ceremony were Kwak Pom Gi, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and others.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the Diplomatic Corps here on the occasion of his birthday.
					The basket and letter were conveyed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Pakistani Ambassador to the DPRK Noorullah Khan, doyen of the corps, on Feb. 10.

articles.title: Memorial Stamps Published in Celebration of February 16
articles.content:
Memorial Stamps Published in Celebration of February 16
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Memorial stamps (four individual stamps) have been published in the DPRK on the threshold of auspicious February 16, the birthday of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il.
					 Shown in the stamps are Plumeria rubra and other plants presented to Kim Jong Il by foreigners and overseas Koreans.
					
					 These gift plants are in full bloom in the International Friendship Greenhouse of the Central Botanical Garden.

articles.title: Preparatory Work for 13th Kimjongilia Festival under Way
articles.content:
Preparatory Work for 13th Kimjongilia Festival under Way
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The preparatory work for the 13th Kimjongilia Festival is progressing apace in the DPRK.
					According to a department director of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee Ri Yong Je, it will bring together 90-odd units including military organs, cabinet commissions, ministries and national institutions, individuals, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other overseas Korean residents' organizations, overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					The festival preparatory committee is doing in full earnest the layout of the festival venue in accordance with the festival theme "Kimjongilia, flower of the sun everlasting along with the Songun era".
					
					The festival hall is being decorated beautifully with the immortal flowers in full bloom with models of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp and Jong Il Peak in the centre.
					
					The applicant units are making full preparations for a successful festival, making exhibition stands such as renovating the exhibition form with flowers as the main and enhancing its quality while tending Kimjongilia in accordance with technical requirements.
					
					The preparations for the Kimjongilia exhibition are at the last stage amid seething zeal of the working people in each province.
					
					The immortal flowers are now at their best in Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses built in North and South Hamgyong, Ryanggang and South Hwanghae Provinces and other parts of the country.
					
					Overseas Korean residents' organizations including Chongryon, overseas Koreans and foreigners are also devoting themselves to the preparations for the festival with boundless reverence for the peerlessly great man.
					
					The grand festival which is shortly to be opened amid the infinite praise and best wishes of humankind for Kim Jong Il who has performed imperishable exploits for the times and the history will add significance and jubilation to the auspicious February holiday.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Policy Termed Anachronistic and Criminal
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Policy Termed Anachronistic and Criminal
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of Defense Gates called for pushing forward "RRW" which has been promoted since the period of the Bush administration, asserting on a number of occasions that it is urgent to modernize the aging U.S. nuclear forces.
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					What the United States seeks through "RRW" is to modernize nuclear weapons in a bid to secure an unchallenged edge over its rivals in the field of strategic nuclear forces.
					
					It is an important content of the U.S. strategy for world domination to take an unchallenged position in the nuclear field and establish, on this basis, domination over the world. The U.S. has massively beefed up its nuclear forces since it developed and produced its first A-bombs in the 1940s, pursuant to the nuclear doctrine that "those who have nukes dominate the world."
					
					What matters is that due to the U.S. nuclear policy the world is heading for a nuclear arms race whether it likes or not.
					
					It is clear that the U.S. has not developed nukes just to exhibit them.
					
					Many people of the world began feeling the urgent need to build nuclear forces, greatly angered by the ferocious nature of the U.S. which posed nuclear threat to its hostile states after dropping A-bombs over Hiroshima and Nagasaki. This brought an era of nuclear arms race to the world.
					
					The same can be said of the reason why the DPRK had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					The DPRK was compelled to take an option for nuclear development which required huge funds, manpower and a lot of time. This was an inevitable security measure for self-defence taken to cope with the situation where the U.S. singled out the DPRK as a target of the former's preemptive nuclear attack and pursued ceaseless moves to start a nuclear war against it.
					
					 Frankly speaking, it was none other than the U.S. that drove the DPRK to nuclear weaponization.
					
					 There are now nuclear weapons huge enough to destroy the earth hundreds of times. They are adversely affecting peace and development of humankind.
					
					 The U.S. is entirely to blame for this grave situation, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Japan's Intention to Develop Early Warning Satellite Disclosed
articles.content:
Japan's Intention to Develop Early Warning Satellite Disclosed
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Defense Ministry of Japan shaped the "basic policy on development and use of space" calling for developing an early warning satellite capable of immediately detecting the launch of a ballistic missile by "enemy state," etc., and has buckled down to the work according to the policy.
					This shows that Japan's moves to use the space for military purposes have reached the danger line.
					
					Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed commentary.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Lurking behind these moves is the wild ambition of the Japanese reactionaries to establish independent missile defense system on the same level as that of the U.S.
					
					Their reckless moves to develop the satellite are a grave challenge to peace and security of the world and a criminal act which can never be pardoned.
					
					What is more serious is the Japanese reactionaries' design to develop the satellite under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK. In fact, the missile threat comes from Japan.
					
					These days the Japanese reactionaries have become frantic in their moves to dispatch troops of the Maritime "Self-Defense Force" to the waters off Somalia for "anti-piracy operations." This is also aimed to legitimately allow overseas military operations and further expand the sphere of such operations.
					
					Japan's moves to be a military power are dangerous military moves for invading Korea and then launching a war for conquering Asia and, furthermore, the rest of the world. Herein lies the danger of the Japanese reactionaries' reckless moves to convert the country into a military power and launch overseas expansion.
					
					Japan is an aggression and war force which the international community should stand guard against, in particular.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bakâ€™s Nonsensical Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Nonsensical Remarks Blasted
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Some time ago traitor Lee Myung Bak, pretending to be unperturbed by the statement issued by the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, talked nonsense that "the north's strongly worded statement is nothing new". He went the lengths of talking about "sincerity" and "affection" in an effort to create impression that he cares for fellow countrymen.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such sophism let loose by the traitor is nothing but a crafty and mean trick to distort the serious situation in which the north-south relations have reached the brink of a war, cover up the nature of the situation and evade the responsibility for the crime he has committed by pushing the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The Lee group is taking much pain to cover up the reality of the inter-Korean relations now on the verge of total collapse, while pretending to remain calm and collected in face of the present situation. The group is, however, sadly mistaken if it thinks it can evade the responsibility for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations with such a poor trick.
					
					 The traitor has pushed the inter-Korean relations to so serious and dangerous phase that such poor word-mongering would not help mislead public opinion at home and abroad or evade the responsibility.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the group of traitors may let loose, it can never evade the blame for having driven the north-south relations to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 The group is working hard to divert elsewhere the criticism of it and justify its criminal "policy toward the north" with an eye to keep pursuing it. It is crystal clear to everybody that this is prompted by its criminal intention to further deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 While striving to solve the national issue, the DPRK can never deal with such traitors as they are steeped in the traitorous way of thinking not to allow any switchover in their confrontational stand, utterly indifferent to the fate of the inter-Korean relations, and they do not feel guilty of the hideous crimes they have committed against the nation.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to settle accounts with the Lee group to the last as it is desperately trying to do harm to the DPRK with daggers under its belt. 
					
					 The group of traitors will certainly be forced to pay a dear price for the unpardonable acts of treachery they have committed, going against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Tradition of Great Revolutionary Upswing
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Tradition of Great Revolutionary Upswing
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will always advance along the road of prosperity as long as there are the immortal tradition of the great revolutionary surge established by President
					Kim Il Sung and the experienced and seasoned politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who glorifies the tradition and the ranks of servicepersons and people who are working hard with the patriotic enthusiasm implanted by the Party and the leader into their minds.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The great revolutionary surge now being effected is a successful inheritance of the tradition of a great upswing in the 1950s which helped glorify the DPRK as the "country of Chollima" and demonstrate its dignity as an invincible socialist power and a new general onward movement to usher in a great heyday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and achieve a great victory in the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation in the 21st century.
					
					Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary surge in Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima movement, on December 24 last year. This marked a historic event which brought about the same epochal turning point in the development of the WPK and the revolution as the President did in December 1956, giving origin to the great Chollima movement.
					
					This reflected the WPK's unshakable will to surely build a great prosperous and powerful nation in this land by racing against the time and dashing forward like the wind with the same vim and vigor as they displayed when building a powerful country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence through the great Chollima surge on debris in the post-war days.
					
					The tradition of great upswing being inherited by the Korean people is a tradition of the single-minded unity as it helps to work world-startling miracles, single-mindedly united with the great leader and the great Party, a tradition of self-reliance which calls for carving out a rosy future by their own efforts with high sense of national esteem and a tradition of popular heroism which encourages them to make a history of great miracles and changes with the might of collectivism.
					
					The tradition of great revolutionary surge has been successfully carried forward generation after generation in the DPRK as the Party and the revolution are led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					He is creating a new history of prosperity by inheriting the tradition of great revolutionary surge. His leadership is bold and dynamic as it helps give fullest play to the mental power of the popular masses and set an example in the times and makes the whole country follow it and work out grandiose plans and high goals and materialize them successfully.
					
					The Korean people have keenly realized while covering the triumphant road of socialism for several decades under the leadership of Kim Jong Il how the tradition of great revolutionary surge has been inherited and how rapidly their country has developed and grown strong in the course of carrying it forward successfully.
					
					The DPRK will eternally prosper along with the history of immortal revolutionary leadership of 
						Kim Jong Il who has glorified the above-said tradition generation after generation, concludes the article.

articles.title: Candlelight Memorial Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Memorial Rally Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally took place in the vicinity of Chonggye Plaza, Seoul, on Feb. 7 to honor the memory of the slain evacuees in Ryongsan under the sponsorship of the All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan, according to CBS of south Korea.
					That day people from all walks of life, 15,000 in all, took to the streets in defiance of the puppet police which totally blocked off the plaza from the previous day to check the rally from being held.
					
					The participants of the rally accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of its fascist outrage against citizens who protested against the Ryongsan incident, not content with the brutal murder of innocent evacuees. 
					
					After the rally they marched to Myongdong Cathedral.
					
					Candlelight actions were simultaneously staged in Pusan, Ulsan and 8 other cities in south Korea on the same day.

articles.title: War Drills to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
War Drills to Be Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The 8th Division of the south Korean puppet army on Feb. 8 announced that it would stage field mobile exercises in Phochon City, Kyonggi Province, and Cholwon County, south Korean Kangwon Province, from Feb. 9 to 14, according to CBS of south Korea.
					The warmongers are planning to wage a drill of maneuvering a large number of troops and military equipment, artillery firing drill and other exercises in the said period.
					
					The war hawks of the puppet military are getting more hell-bent on the reckless anti-DPRK war exercises from the outset of the year, claiming that they would back the Lee Myung Bak group's policy of confrontation with the DPRK by military strength.

articles.title: Security Authorities' Fascist Suppression Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Security Authorities' Fascist Suppression Assailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations and political parties, including the Association of Evacuees and the Democratic Labor Party, students and Netizens in south Korea held a candlelight memorial service for the dead Ryongsan evacuees in Seoul on Feb. 6, at which they denounced the puppet police authorities for their fascist violence.
					Speakers charged that the police authorities hurled hundreds of policemen to check the above-said memorial service, groundlessly terming it a rally after blocking off Chonggye Plaza in Seoul to bar the 3rd meeting for condemning Lee Myung Bak and mourning the victims, which is scheduled to be held on Feb. 7.
					
					The police went the length of obstructing the information activities of students calling for participation in the memorial service, they pointed out, declaring that their just struggle would be rapidly spread into across south Korea no matter how amuck the security authorities are running to block their way.
					
					The said 3rd meeting should be held without fail, they said, calling on the broad masses of people to join in the memorial service.

articles.title: Puppet Police's Wrongdoing Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Police's Wrongdoing Flayed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 6 denouncing the puppet police for misleading the public opinion related to the Ryongsan incident.
					The statement charged that upset by the population's daily growing protest and criticism against the police's recent murder of Ryongsan evacuees, the police are working hard to build up public opinion designed to shift the responsibility for the incident on to the evacuees.
					
					Not content with the said bloody incident by the dictatorial regime, the police seek to blindfold the people and stop their ear, it pointed out, expressing surging anger at such behavior.
					
					It held that the police, who killed evacuees, acting as a henchman of the murderous Lee Myung Bak regime, and are now getting hell-bent on misleading public opinion, should come to their senses.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Cambodia and Britain to Celebrate February Holiday
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Cambodia and Britain to Celebrate February Holiday
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Cambodia and Britain on Jan. 31 and Feb. 3 on the occasion of the February holiday, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the royal palace and chairman of the Cambodian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 highly praised President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as benefactors whom the Cambodian people can never forget.
					
					 The preparatory committee would widely introduce the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and exploits performed by them among Cambodians on the occasions of the significant days, he said, hoping that the DPRK would make a big success in all fields under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.
					
					Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that socialist Korea of Juche is highly demonstrating its dignity thanks to the wise Songun leadership of
						Kim Jong Il, adding that the world progressive people sincerely offer the best wishes to him on the occasion of his birthday.

articles.title: Funcion artistica de agricultores por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Funcion artistica de agricultores por el 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la Granja de Mangyongdae la funcion artistica de los trabajadores agricolas intitulada "Cancion de felicitacion al General"
					En esta escena iniciada con la poesia y coro "Tributamos la gloria al General Kim Jong Il" se presentaron las piezas que reflejan el infinito jubilo y el deseo de felicitar de los trabajadores agricolas y otros habitantes coreanos que acogeran pronto la mas jubilosa fiesta nacional de febrero.
					
					En el solo femenino "Flor de escarcha", la cancion acompanada de Kayagum (instrumento musical de Corea) "Pensando en el camino del Songun (priorizacion militar)" y otras piezas los ejecutantes elogiaron fervientemente las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien enarbolando la bandera roja de la revolucion en que esta reflejada toda la vida del Presidente Kim Il Sung, defiende la dignidad y la soberania del pais y logra la prosperidad eterna de la nacion.
					
					La interpretacion de Jangsaenap (flauta coreana) y cancion "Arirang entre el ejercito y el pueblo", el monologo "Leyenda de Taehongdan", el coro mixto "Plantamos manzanos silvestres en el monte", el tambor y cancion "Corramos a todo galope hacia la gran potencia prospera" y otras piezas describieron excelentemente los cambios, que el ejercito y el pueblo dan en el campo socialista con sus fuerzas unidas bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente, y el patriotismo de los trabajadores agricolas.
					
					Presenciaron el espectaculo el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea, Kang Chang Uk, y otros funcionarios, asi como trabajadores agricolas del municipio de Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta del Cuerpo Diplomatico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta del Cuerpo Diplomatico
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion que le dirigiera el Cuerpo Diplomatico acreditado en Corea con motivo de su cumpleanos (16 de febrero).
					El embajador de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, Noorullah Khan, quien preside dicho cuerpo, los entrego el dia 10 al secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la criminal politica nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la criminal politica nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- El secretario norteamericano de Defensa, Gates, dijo en varias ocasiones que es urgente la modernizacion de las envejecidas fuerzas armadas nucleares de EE.UU. e insistio en la necesidad de seguir impulsando el "plan de confiables ojivas nucleares substitutas" (RRW en ingles) que comenzo a ponerse en practica desde la administracion Bush.
					Lo que persigue EE.UU. a traves de la implementacion de dicho plan es acelerar la modernizacion de armas nucleares para tomar la supremacia absoluta frente a sus rivales en la rama de las fuerzas nucleares estrategicas.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 10 y continua:
					
					La estrategia de heguemonia mundial de EE.UU. consiste fundamentalmente en ocupar la posicion monopolista en el dominio nuclear y establecer basandose en esto la esfera de dominio sobre el mundo.
					
					Desde la decada de 1940, cuando desarrollo y fabrico la primera bomba atomica segun la doctrina de "El portador de armas nucleares domina el mundo", hasta la fecha, el imperio vino aumentando en gran medida sus fuerzas armadas nucleares
					
					El problema es que la politica nuclear de EE.UU. hace a los paises del mundo emprender la carrera armamentista nuclear, la quieran o no.
					
					EE.UU. desarrollo las armas nucleares no para exhibirlas en el museo.
					
					Efectivamente, lanzo bombas atomicas sobre Hiroshima y Nagasaki y ejercio la amenaza nuclear a los paises hostiles. 
					
					Esta barbaridad hizo a mucha gente del mundo percatarse del caracter urgente de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, lo cual dio inicio a la epoca de carrera armamentista nuclear en el globo terraqueo.
					
					Paso lo mismo en el caso de la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC se vio obligada a tomar la medida para la autodefensa de desarrollar las armas nucleares, que requieren fabulosos fondos, mano de obra y tiempo, dado que EE.UU. la definio como blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear y la amenaza constantemente con desatar una guerra nuclear.
					
					En la actualidad, en el mundo existe una enorme cantidad de armas nucleares suficiente para destruir cien veces la Tierra, lo cual ejerce grandes influencias negativas a la paz y al desarrollo de la humanidad.
					
					EE.UU. es totalmente responsable de esta grave situacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza desarrollo de satelite por Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza desarrollo de satelite por Japon
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, el Ministerio de Defensa de Japon impulsa activamente el desarrollo del satelite de alerta previa, capaz de detectar de inmediato el lanzamiento del misil balistico por parte de los "paises enemigos", en virtud de la "orientacion principal sobre el desarrollo y el uso del cosmos" que incluye esa labor y otras.
					Esto demuestra que las maniobras de Japon por la militarizacion del cosmos entran en la etapa peligrosa.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 10 y continua:
					
					Las imprudentes maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses parten de la ambicion de establecer por si solos un sistema antimisiles de igual nivel que el de Estados Unidos.
					
					Por lo tanto, resultan un grave desafio a la paz y la seguridad del mundo y un acto criminal nunca perdonable.
					
					Lo grave del caso es que ellos tratan de desarrollar dicho satelite pretextando la "amenaza de misil" proveniente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuando en realidad Japon es el que amenaza a esta con este artefacto.
					
					Ultimamente, los reaccionarios japoneses actuan tenazmente para enviar a sus "Fuerzas Maritimas de Autodefensa" al mar frente a Somalia para el supuesto "aniquilamiento de los piratas", lo cual parte de la intencion de permitir juridicamente las operaciones militares en ultramar y ampliar su teatro. 
					
					Las acciones de Japon para convertirse en una potencia militar y expandirse a ultramar devienen peligroso movimiento militar para conquistar el continente asiatico y el resto del mundo comenzando por agredir a Corea.
					
					Japon es la fuerza agresora y belicista, de la cual debe tomar especial precaucion la sociedad internacional.
